pages.text: I was searching for something that would calm down those pigs in the nether. And after some sleepless nights, I finally found a cheep way of doing this.  I simply made a copper ring and then with the help of a little brush and calm hands, I cover it whole in a thin layer of gold. When To try it I walk past them and they didn't event notice that it was only glided. It was my first success.
Piglins loves gold no matter its form, but if they knew about this (heresy), they wouldn't be so nice for its holder.

Unfortunately I drop it and one of them gets time to take a look at it. This was my biggest mistake, because after realizing this $(l)$(5)"heresy"$(), this piglin called the rest of them. It was a miracle that I even got out of that mess.$(br)$(o)$(7)Remember to never give it to them.$()
